name: Run Jhonny Run- A Fun Runner Game
name_original: Run Jhonny Run- A Fun Runner Game
description:
Help Jhonny Dodge Junk Food and Collect Coins!
CONTROLS:
Click LEFT or RIGHT to DODGE and SPACE to JUMP

The Faster Jhonny Runs the More Calories he Burns..Can You help him?
Compare your High Score with your friends too!

Special Features:-
* Endless Track
* Save Highscore
* Addicting Gameplay
* Easy to play
